text: Bachia didactyla is a species of lizard in the family Gymnophthalmidae. It is endemic to Brazil. ==References== Category:Bachia Category:Reptiles described in 2011 Category:Reptiles of Brazil Category:Endemic fauna of Brazil Category:Taxa named by Joseana Luisa de Freitas Category:Taxa named by Christine Strüssman Category:Taxa named by Marcos André de Carvalho Category:Taxa named by Ricardo Alexandre Kawashita-Ribeiro Category:Taxa named by Tami Mott
title: Bachia didactyla
